DOC.brief_summary: A randomize trial: expectation or evacuatio uteri for the treatment after late abortion
DOC.brief_title: Treatment of Late Abortion: Evacuatio Uteri or Conservative Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize trial adressing 200 women consecutively recruited from clinical practice at Rigshospitalet.Expectation: administration of 800 microgram Cytotec half an hour after delivery. Surgery: Evacuation of the uterus
DOC.criteria: abortion at gestational age (ultrasound) 14+0 20+0 Allergy to cytotec
